item.title: Rachel add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles... ...they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Rachel add a quote by Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis
item.description: "If you bungle raising your children, I don't think whatever else you do well matters very much." -- Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis
